My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation <FI>is<Fi> from him.
He only <FI>is<Fi> my rock and my salvation: <FI>he is<Fi> my defence; I shall not be moved.

Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart <FI>upon them<Fi>.
God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power <FI>belongeth<Fi> unto God.<RF>power: or, strength<Rf>
Also unto thee, O Lord, <FI>belongeth<Fi> mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.<CM>
